name: Virus Hunter Triple Threat
description:
Don the mantle of a White Blood Cell and defend your patient against three major diseases. Battle Covid before it gets to your patient, battle the bacteria that try to sneak by you and destroy the MRSA before it settles. You have twenty minutes and twenty viruses, find them before the time runs out. Navigate the maze of blood vessels and muscle tissue in Virus Hunter Triple Threat. This project was a team effort for a capstone class, it took three of us three months to make this game. It is all done in Unreal Engine with blueprints and C++ for the visual studio. We also used Agile Scrum management and Bitbucket to show we know how to work in modern game studios. 

This game was done for a class. It was done with three people, Richard Maddern, Evan Bonk, and Mark Garvin.
